hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Abdullah bin Mughaffal that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) forbade praying in the camel pens. [1] A'tan:Kneeling places, or, where they kneel to drink water

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ نَهْىِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم عَنِ الصَّلاَةِ فِي أَعْطَانِ الإِبِلِ
chapter.eng-name: The Prophet (ﷺ) Prohibiting Prayer in Camel Pens[1]
